issue.title: custom main problems with time and loading plugins

content.raw:
Hi, do you have any news about this issue ?

I'm trying to load plugins in a custom main too, i think @traversaro know theses plugins, it's gazebo_yarp_controlboard for icub.
And it seems it's not working, so maybe you solved it ?

Best regards,
content.html:
Hi, do you have any news about this issue ?

I'm trying to load plugins in a custom main too, i think @traversaro know theses plugins, it's gazebo_yarp_controlboard for icub. And it seems it's not working, so maybe you solved it ?
